crown.name: CSK_Module_MultiImageFilter
crown.desc: This is an automatically generated CROWN (description not necessary).

crown.name: CSK_MultiImageFilter
crown.desc: Module to provide image filter processing functionality. Multiple instances can be created and will run in multiple threads on the device. + This module provides a UI for all relevant features. + {empty} + Typically to configure this module to work with other modules you should do this: + {empty} + 1) If multiple instances are needed, these can be added via 'addInstance()' (not needed if you only use 1 single instace). + 2) Select the instance you want to configur via setInstance(). + 3) Set the image filter type via 'setFilterType' and optionally set according filter values if necessary. + 4) Set the event providing the images to be processed e.g. via setRegisterEvent('CSK_ImagePlayer.OnNewImage'). + 5) Other modules can register on the 'CSK_MultiImageFilter.OnNewImage[NUM]' event to receive the filtred image for further processing. + {empty} + INFO: It is possible to combine multiple filters / instances by adding instances and to register to the related preprocessed image like described in step 5). +

item.desc: Convert RGB image to gray image.
item.name: Gray

item.desc: Convert RGB image to Lab channels.
item.name: Lab

item.desc: Manually set config to transform image.
item.name: MANUAL

item.desc: Receive config to transform image from external source via event.
item.name: EXTERNAL

event.name: OnNewStatusLoadParameterOnReboot
event.desc: Notify status if parameters should be loaded on app/device boot up.

event.name: OnPersistentDataModuleAvailable
event.desc: Notify status if features of CSK_PersistentData module are available.

event.name: OnNewInstanceList
event.desc: Event to provide list of created instances.

event.name: OnNewProcessingParameter
event.desc: Event to share processing parameters to the instances.

param.desc: Number of the instance to receive the parameter.
param.name: objectNo

param.desc: If parameter is for specific internal used object, its number.
param.name: internalObjectNo

event.name: OnNewSelectedInstance
event.desc: Notify if new instance is selected.

event.name: OnDataLoadedOnReboot
event.desc: Event to call if module tried to load parameters and should be ready.

event.name: OnNewImageNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to provide result image of instance. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewImage1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewParameterName
event.desc: Notify name of persistent data parameter.

event.name: OnUserLevelOperatorActive
event.desc: Status of Operator userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelMaintenanceActive
event.desc: Status of Maintenance userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelServiceActive
event.desc: Status of Service userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelAdminActive
event.desc: Status of Admin userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnNewValueUpdateNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to sync paramters between instance threads and Controller part of module. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewResult1"). +

param.desc: Instance new value is coming from.
param.name: instance

param.desc: Name of the paramter to update/sync.
param.name: parameter

param.desc: Optionally if internal parameter should be used for internal objects.
param.name: selectedObject

event.name: OnNewValueToForwardNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to forward data from instance thread to Controller part of module, e.g. to forward values to UI. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewResult1"). +

param.desc: Eventname to use to forward value.
param.name: eventname

event.name: OnNewResult
event.desc: Generic event to notify results. E.g. to forward results from single instances.

event.name: OnNewStatusImageFilterType
event.desc: Notify selected image filter type.

event.name: OnNewViewerID
event.desc: Notify currently used viewerID (e.g. to show correct viewer in UI).

event.name: OnNewStatusRegisteredEvent
event.desc: Notify event instance is registered to receive new image to process.

event.name: OnNewStatusShowImage
event.desc: Notify if image should be showed in UI.

event.name: OnNewStatusBlurKernelSizePix
event.desc: Notify kernel size of blur filter.

event.name: OnNewStatusCannyThresholds
event.desc: Notify threshold values of canny filter.

event.name: OnNewStatusCropPosX
event.desc: Notify x position to crop image.

param.desc: The x position of the top-left corner of the cropped image in the source image.
param.name: posX

event.name: OnNewStatusCropPosY
event.desc: Notify y position to crop image.

param.desc: The y position of the top-left corner of the cropped image in the source image.
param.name: poxY

event.name: OnNewStatusCropWidth
event.desc: Notify width of cropped image.

param.desc: The width of the cropped image.
param.name: width

event.name: OnNewStatusCropHeight
event.desc: Notify height of cropped image.

param.desc: The height of the cropped image.
param.name: height

event.name: OnNewStatusFlowConfigPriority
event.desc: Notify if FlowConfig should have priority for FlowConfig relevant configurations.

event.name: OnNewStatusRegisteredTransformationEvent
event.desc: Notify event to receive transformation data to align image.

event.name: OnNewStatusTransformationSource
event.desc: Notify source for transformation data.

event.name: OnNewStatusTransformationX
event.desc: Notify manual transformation in x direction.

event.name: OnNewStatusTransformationY
event.desc: Notify manual transformation in y direction.

event.name: OnNewStatusTransformationAngle
event.desc: Notify manual transformation angle.

event.name: OnNewStatusTransformationAngleOriginX
event.desc: Notify transformation angle origin x position.

event.name: OnNewStatusTransformationAngleOriginY
event.desc: Notify transformation angle origin y position.

event.name: OnNewStatusCSKStyle
event.desc: Notify UI style to use for CSK modules.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleVersion
event.desc: Notify version of module.

event.name: OnNewStatusModuleIsActive
event.desc: Notify if module can be used on device.

event.name: OnNewStatusCropPositionSource
event.desc: Notify source for crop position.

event.name: OnNewStatusRegisteredCropPositionEvent
event.desc: Notify event to receive transformation data to crop specific part in image.

event.name: OnNewStatusUIMessage
event.desc: Notfiy message to show in UI.

event.name: OnNewStatusLabChannel
event.desc: Notify channel to use of Lab image.

function.name: setParameterName
function.desc: Function to set the name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module.

function.name: sendParameters
function.desc: Send parameters to CSK_PersistentData module if possible to save them.

param.desc: [Optional] Set to TRUE if the data should NOT be saved immediately after sending.
param.name: noDataSave

function.name: setLoadOnReboot
function.desc: Configure if this module should load its saved parameters at app/ device boot up.

function.name: pageCalled
function.desc: Function to register "OnResume" of the module UI (only as helper function).

return.desc: Empty string (only needed to simplify binding).
return.name: empty

function.name: setSelectedInstance
function.desc: Select one of the multiple instances.

function.name: getInstancesAmount
function.desc: Get the amount of created instances of this module.

function.name: setRegisterEvent
function.desc: Configure event that this module should listen to. If this one is notified, it will be linked to internal processing function. + (Will be set to currently active instance, see "setSelectedObject")

function.name: processInstanceNUM
function.desc: Example of dynamically served function to process internally coded function. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "processInstance1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsFunction" if function of sepecific instance exists. + Needs then to be called via "Script.callFunction".

function.name: addInstance
function.desc: Function to add an additional instance.

function.name: resetInstances
function.desc: Function to reset instances to one single instance. + IMPORTANT: As instances start their own threads, the module needs to be restarted if new instances are needed... (see AppEngine docu for "Script.startScript").

function.name: setFilterType
function.desc: Function to set filter type.

function.name: setShowImage
function.desc: Function to select if image should be shown on UI.

function.name: setBlurKernelSizePix
function.desc: Function to set kernel size of blur filter.

param.desc: Size of the kernel. Must be positive.
param.name: kernelSize

function.name: setCannyThreshold
function.desc: Function to set threshold range of canny filter.

function.name: setCropPosX
function.desc: Function to set x position to crop image.

param.desc: The x position of the top-left corner of the cropped image in the source image.
param.name: posX

function.name: setCropPosY
function.desc: Function to set y position to crop image.

param.desc: The y position of the top-left corner of the cropped image in the source image.
param.name: posY

function.name: setCropWidth
function.desc: Function to set widht of cropped image.

param.desc: The width of the cropped image.
param.name: width

function.name: setCropHeight
function.desc: Function to set height of cropped image.

param.desc: The height of the cropped image.
param.name: height

function.name: clearFlowConfigRelevantConfiguration
function.desc: Function to clear FlowConfig relevant configurations.

function.name: setFlowConfigPriority
function.desc: Function to configure if FlowConfig should have priority for FlowConfig relevant configuration.

function.name: setRegisterTransformationEvent
function.desc: Function to set event to receive transformation data to align image.

param.desc: Event (needs to provide translation data as 'Transform' object).
param.name: event

function.name: setTransformationSource
function.desc: Function to set source of transformation data.

function.name: setTransformationX
function.desc: Functin to set manual transformation in x direction.

function.name: setTransformationY
function.desc: Functin to set manual transformation in y direction.

function.name: setTransformationAngle
function.desc: Functin to set manual transformation angle.

param.desc: Transformation angle in degree between -180 and +180.
param.name: angle

function.name: setTransformationAngleOriginX
function.desc: Function to set xPos of origin for manual angle transformation.

function.name: setTransformationAngleOriginY
function.desc: Function to set yPos of origin for manual angle transformation.

function.name: getStatusModuleActive
function.desc: Function to get status if module is active.

function.name: setCropPositionSource
function.desc: Function to set source of crop position.

function.name: setRegisterCropPositionEvent
function.desc: Function to set event to receive transformation position data to crop image.

param.desc: Event (needs to provide translation data as 'Transform' object).
param.name: event

function.name: loadParameters
function.desc: Load parameters for this module from the CSK_PersistentData module if possible and use them.

function.name: getParameters
function.desc: Function to get all parameters of the client in JSON format.

param.desc: Number of instance to get parameters from.
param.name: instanceNo

function.name: resetModule
function.desc: Function to reset main configuration of module.

function.name: setLabChannel
function.desc: Function to set which channel to use of Lab image.

crown.name: MultiImageFilter_FC
crown.desc: Crown to provide CSK_FlowConfig relevant features.

crown.name: ImageSource
crown.desc: Set source of images to process.

function.name: create
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig create function.

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: imageSource
function.desc: Set source of images to process.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

param.desc:
Set source of images to process.
Parameter: 1: image (IMAGE)
param.name: imageSource

param.desc:
(optional) Set source of transformation to use on image.
Parameter: 1: transformation (TRANSFORM)
param.name: transformationSource

event.name: OnNewImage
event.desc: Provide filtered image.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

function.name: create
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig create function.

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: register
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig register function.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

crown.name: Process
crown.desc: Set source of images to filter and provide filtered images.

function.name: create
function.desc: Internally used CSK_FlowConfig create function.

return.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
return.name: handle

function.name: process
function.desc: Set source event of incoming images and provide result image event.

param.desc: Handle to internally used FlowConfig instance.
param.name: handle

param.desc:
Set source of images to process.
Parameter: 1: image (IMAGE)
param.name: imageSource

param.desc:
(optional) Set source of transformation to use on image.
Parameter: 1: transformation (TRANSFORM)
param.name: transformationSource
